  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize function for the controller of the main.fxml. The initialize function utilizes multiple lambda expressions to create a hover animation for the buttons in the main form. The lambda expressions greatly minimizes the amount of code to create this hover animation.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the url
      resourceBundle - the resourceBundle to be used

    • onCustomersButtonClick

      public void onCustomersButtonClick() throws IOException
      Handles the click event for the customers button. Loads the customers.fxml when clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - load() throws IOException

    • onAppointmentsButtonClick

      public void onAppointmentsButtonClick() throws IOException
      Handles the click event for the appointments button. Loads the appointments.fxml when clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - load() throws IOException

    • onReportsButtonClick

      public void onReportsButtonClick() throws IOException
      Handles the click event for the reports button. Loads the reports.fxml when clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - load() throws IOException

    • onSignOutButtonClick

      public void onSignOutButtonClick() throws IOException
      Handles the click event for the sign-out button. Loads the login.fxml when clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - load() throws IOException

    • onExitButtonClick

      public void onExitButtonClick()
      Handles the click event for the exit button. Closes the application.
